title: Nutriota Alpha Lipoic Acid | 500 mg (180 Capsules)
aboutContent: POWERFUL ANTIOXIDANT SUPPORT: Each vegan capsule contains 500mg of high-quality Alpha Lipoic Acid (ALA), a powerful antioxidant that helps reduce inflammation and supports healthy nervous system function. Our body's natural ALA production decreases with age, making supplementation increasingly important for overall wellness. EXCELLENT VALUE: With 180 capsules per bottle, this provides a full 6-month supply at an outstanding value. Manufactured in a GMP-compliant facility in the UK following strict quality standards. SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: If our Alpha Lipoic Acid supplement doesn't meet your expectations, contact us for an immediate refund with no questions asked.
descriptionContent: Alpha Lipoic Acid is a naturally occurring compound that helps the body break down carbohydrates and produce energy. This potent antioxidant supplement promotes normal blood glucose levels, supports nerve health, and may help relieve tingling in hands and feet. Suitable for vegans and vegetarians, our ALA capsules provide the additional antioxidant support your body needs as natural production declines with age.
ingredientsContent: Alpha lipoic acid, anti-caking agents (magnesium stearate, silicon dioxide), HydroxyPropylMethylCellulose (coating agent).
generalInfoContent:
Units: 180 count
Brand: Nutriota
Format: Capsule
Age Range Description: Adult
